name: Kafka-connect-new-relic
title: Kafka Connect New Relic
description: New Relic connector allows moving data from Kafka to New Relic. It writes data from Kafka topic which is in a particular form like events or metrics and utilizes the NewRelic java SDK to write into New Relic.

support.summary: New Relic supports the New Relic sink connector alongside community members as part of its Confluent Platform open source offering.
